SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT convert (smallint, req_spid) As spid, rsc_dbid As dbid, rsc_objid As ObjId, so.Name As ObjectName, rsc_indid As IndId, substring (v.name, 1, 4) As Type, substring (rsc_text, 1, 16) as Resource, substring (u.name, 1, 8 ) As Mode, substring (x.name, 1, 5) As Status, substring (sp.hostname,1,15) as hostname, substring (sp.nt_username,1,15) as nt_name, sp.hostprocess As HostPID FROM master.dbo.syslockinfo sli WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN master.dbo.spt_values v WITH(NOLOCK) ON sli.rsc_type = v.number AND v.type = 'LR' JOIN master.dbo.spt_values x WITH(NOLOCK) ON sli.req_status = x.number AND x.type = 'LS' JOIN master.dbo.spt_values u WITH(NOLOCK) ON sli.req_mode + 1 = u.number AND u.type = 'L' JOIN master.dbo.sysdatabases sd WITH(NOLOCK) ON sli.rsc_dbid = sd.dbid JOIN :1.dbo.sysobjects so WITH(NOLOCK) ON sli.rsc_objid = so.id join master.dbo.sysprocesses sp WITH(NOLOCK) on convert (smallint, req_spid) = sp.spid WHERE sd.name = ':1' and (u.name ='X' or u.name = 'U') order by spid

SELECT convert (smallint, req_spid) As spid, rsc_dbid As dbid, rsc_objid As ObjId, so.Name As ObjectName, rsc_indid As IndId, substring (v.name, 1, 4) As Type, substring (rsc_text, 1, 16) as Resource, substring (u.name, 1, 8 ) As Mode, substring (x.name, 1, 5) As Status, substring (sp.hostname,1,15) as hostname, substring (sp.nt_username,1,15) as nt_name
FROM master.dbo.syslockinfo sli WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN master.dbo.spt_values v WITH(NOLOCK) ON sli.rsc_type = v.number AND v.type = 'LR' JOIN master.dbo.spt_values x WITH(NOLOCK) ON sli.req_status = x.number AND x.type = 'LS' JOIN master.dbo.spt_values u WITH(NOLOCK) ON sli.req_mode + 1 = u.number AND u.type = 'L' JOIN master.dbo.sysdatabases sd WITH(NOLOCK) ON sli.rsc_dbid = sd.dbid JOIN :1.dbo.sysobjects so WITH(NOLOCK) ON sli.rsc_objid = so.id join master.dbo.sysprocesses sp WITH(NOLOCK) on convert (smallint, req_spid) = sp.spid WHERE sd.name = ':1' and x.name='WAIT' order by spid

SELECT convert (smallint, req_spid) As spid, rsc_dbid As dbid, rsc_objid As ObjId, so.Name As ObjectName, rsc_indid As IndId, substring (v.name, 1, 4) As Type, substring (rsc_text, 1, 16) as Resource, substring (u.name, 1, 8 ) As Mode, substring (x.name, 1, 5) As Status, substring (sp.hostname,1,15) as hostname, substring (sp.nt_username,1,15) as nt_name
FROM master.dbo.syslockinfo sli WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN master.dbo.spt_values v WITH(NOLOCK) ON sli.rsc_type = v.number AND v.type = 'LR' JOIN master.dbo.spt_values x WITH(NOLOCK) ON sli.req_status = x.number AND x.type = 'LS' JOIN master.dbo.spt_values u WITH(NOLOCK) ON sli.req_mode + 1 = u.number AND u.type = 'L' JOIN master.dbo.sysdatabases sd WITH(NOLOCK) ON sli.rsc_dbid = sd.dbid JOIN :1.dbo.sysobjects so WITH(NOLOCK) ON sli.rsc_objid = so.id join master.dbo.sysprocesses sp WITH(NOLOCK) on convert (smallint, req_spid) = sp.spid WHERE rsc_text = ':2' order by spid
